name: Abundant Harvest
oracle_text: Choose land or nonland. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Aeromoeba
oracle_text:
Flying
Discard a card: Switch Aeromoeba's power and toughness until end of turn.
flavor_text: Some clouds heed no wind.

name: Arcbound Mouser
oracle_text:
Lifelink
Modular 1 (This creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)
flavor_text: It doesn't purr. It hums.

name: Arcbound Prototype
oracle_text: Modular 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)
flavor_text: It flickered to life, saw itself alone, and began to build.

Modular 4 (This creature enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)
Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of an additional +1/+1 counter or haste.)

Menace

oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or discard a card.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

Trample

Flying
